welcome We pride ourselves on being a company that genuinely puts  customer service at the top of our agenda. What we guarantee is a personal touch and continual support of your  business, you are a name and a establishment with your own  customers to satisfy - not just an account number. We offer our customers an extensive range of frozen, chilled and  ambient foods together with beverages, packaging, disposables and  many more items required by the catering industry. We are always happy to listen to our customers’ requests for additions  to our range. With a dedicated sales force backed up by our friendly  and efficient office team, together with a professional group of  drivers, pickers and warehouse staff, we pride ourselves on the service  we are able to offer our customers.

flavours Salads & Dips Sandwich Fillings - Seafood Sandwich Fillings - Dairy Sandwich Fillings - Chicken Sandwich Fillings - Meatballs Marinated & Pulled Meats Our sister company Flavours Foods was formed in  2006 with a vision to provide the food to go,  wholesale and catering markets with high quality  Sandwich Fillings, Marinated Meats and Compound Salads.  Drawing upon decades of food technology expertise  the Flavours team have grown a renowned brand that is  recognised and respected throughout the food industry. Flavours philosophy is to produce a safe, quality product  at a competitive price. This is achieved in their BRC  accredited production facility using only the finest  ingredients.
